design_audit.estimand: IV coefficient on VA (testing if VAM coefficient = 1)
design_audit.iv_structure: lottery assignment instruments for school VAM, conditional on lottery_FE

claim_object.outcome_concept: Student test score in year after lottery (testz2003, average of math and reading z-scores)
claim_object.treatment_concept: Value-added measure (VAM) of assigned school (constructed from pre-lottery cohorts)
claim_object.estimand_concept: IV estimate of the effect of school VAM on student achievement, instrumented by lottery assignment; test whether coefficient equals 1 (unbiased VAM)
claim_object.target_population: Students on the margin in CMS school choice lottery (onmargin==1), grades 4-8, Spring 2002 lottery

baseline_specs.label: Table1-Model2-AR-allpre
baseline_specs.instrument: lott_VA (hm_mod2ar_all_test if lottery==0, ch1_mod2ar_all_test if lottery==1)
baseline_specs.notes: Model 2 (gains/lagged scores): average residual VA estimated on all pre-lottery years. xtivreg2 with lottery_FE FE and bootstrap(100) cluster(lottery_FE).

constraints.notes: VAM and controls are structurally linked: the VAM model (Model 1 vs 2) determines what controls are in the first-stage VAM estimation. Controls in the IV second stage (lagged test scores) are shared with the VAM construction. Cannot independently vary VAM controls and IV controls.

canonical.notes: Bootstrap(100) clustered at lottery_FE level, matching paper's xtivreg2 bootstrap specification

variants.notes: Analytic clustered SEs at lottery_FE level (no bootstrap)

diagnostics_plan.notes: Balance test: lottery winners vs losers on pre-treatment characteristics (Table A1)
First stage: lottery -> enrollment in first-choice school (Table A3)
